title: Interpretation of seeing a bag or suitcase in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of losing a bag or bag in a dream and a bag or suitcase in which people’s things are placed. It can be a women's bag, it can be a travel bag or anything else. In a dream, it shows keeping secrets and fulfilling desires. A new bag can indicate good luck for a girl or marriage. Losing a bag or wallet indicates the loss of a job, the loss of something valuable, or the loss of a person, and we will explain this in detail by presenting the interpretations of the great imams in interpretation, such as Ibn Sirin and others. One of the scholars of interpretation of visions and dreams in ancient and modern times, and the interpretation of seeing a purse or suitcase lost in a dream, for a young man and single man. A girl, for a man, for a married woman, for a widow, for a divorced woman, for a pregnant woman, so join us in a visible place. What is the interpretation of Imam Ibn Sirin seeing a lost purse or bag in a dream? Seeing a lost purse in a dream indicates the revelation of secrets. Seeing a stolen purse or bag In a dream, it indicates wasting time on useless matters and recklessness. Seeing a lost or stolen bag indicates the loss of a loved one, who may be a relative or a friend. What is the interpretation of a dream about losing a bag for a single woman? Seeing a girl losing her wallet indicates that she is revealing her personal secrets and exposing her affairs among her family. And her friends. If a girl sees that her bag is stolen or missing, it indicates the loss of a valuable opportunity such as a job or a good husband. If she sees that her bag is lost and she cannot find it, it indicates a waste of money, failure in study, or failure to accept a job. Consider buying a new bag, foretells good luck and good news. What What is the interpretation of a dream about losing a bag and then finding it? Seeing a lost bag or bag indicates the loss of something valuable in the dream. Seeing a new bag It indicates good luck. Checking out a shiny new bag It indicates the fulfillment of desires. Seeing a bag that was found after losing it indicates overcoming overcoming Adversity and difficulties. What is the interpretation of a dream of stealing a bag for a married woman? Seeing a bag full of fruits and vegetables indicates an abundance of goodness and luxury in her life. Seeing a bag being stolen in a married woman’s dream indicates restlessness, anxiety, and frequent quarrels and marital quarrels. Seeing a locked bag in a married woman’s dream shows that she keeps the secrets of her home. If a married woman sees that her husband gave her an elegant bag, it indicates mutual love between them, stability and family happiness and may indicate a new pregnancy. Seeing opening the bag and finding it full of things and money indicates the fulfillment of desires and good luck. What is the interpretation of a dream about losing a black bag? Seeing a bag lost Black in the dream of an unmarried young man: It indicates the loss of something valuable. If the young man sees that he is carrying a bag, it indicates overcoming difficulties and crises. Seeing a bag full of fruit in the dream of an unmarried young man announces his marriage to a beautiful girl. What is the interpretation of a dream of a white bag for a single woman? Seeing the white bag in The dream of a single woman indicates the girl’s righteousness and religion. Seeing a large bag full of valuables indicates good luck and a bright future. Seeing an opening

title: Interpretation of seeing eye color change in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a change in eye color in a dream via the vision website roy2a.com. Changing eye color indicates correct decisions. Changing eye color from black or brown to blue is undesirable and indicates material losses, anxiety, and pain in the eyes indicates adversity and difficulties that the viewer faces, and we will explain. This is detailed in this article, the interpretation of seeing a moving house in a dream for a married man, an unmarried young man and an unmarried girl, as well as a married and pregnant woman, as well as a divorced woman and a widow, by presenting the interpretations of major interpreters of visions and dreams such as Imam Muhammad ibn Sirin in the past and scholars of interpretation and visions in the era. Hadith, so follow us on the Roya website. What is the interpretation of seeing eye color changing in a dream according to Imam Ibn Sirin: Seeing eye color changing in a dream indicates radical changes and renewal in the dreamer’s life. If the change is for the better and seeing defects in the eye indicates problems and fears... Seeing pain in the eye indicates fears and pain and may indicate leaving a job or problems at work. A vision that cleans the eye of dirt and indicates overcoming adversity, eliminating problems and disagreements, falling problems and psychological comfort. Seeing with only one eye indicates corruption of religion and distance from God. See also: Interpretation of seeing the pupil in a dream What is the interpretation of seeing a change in eye color in a dream for a single woman: Seeing a change in eye color in a dream for a single girl indicates a lack of patience and haste in making decisions. If a girl sees that her eyes are beautiful in a dream, it indicates success and achieving the highest grades. And the prestigious job. If a girl sees that her eyes are sick, she remembers the problems and trials she faces in her professional and social life. See also: Interpretation of seeing an eye injury in a dream What is the interpretation of seeing a change in eye color in a dream for a married woman: Seeing eye color changing from brown to blue in a dream Married woman: It indicates bad things, problems, worries, and shameful actions. If a married woman sees that she is cleaning her eyes from dirt, it indicates the collapse of marital problems and disputes, the improvement of their financial situation, and the repayment of debts. If a married woman sees that her eyes have turned blue, it says that her husband has suffered material losses in... Trade or leaving his job. See also: Interpretation of seeing eye discharge in a dream Interpretation of seeing a change in eye color in a dream for a pregnant woman: Dreaming of a change in eye color in a pregnant woman’s dream, and her eyes were beautiful. It indicates the cessation of fatigue and pain, the facilitation of childbirth, and the health of the newborn. If a pregnant woman sees that she is cleaning her eyes of dirt, it indicates an easy birth and a stable, safe life. What is the interpretation of seeing eye color changing in a dream for a divorced woman: Seeing eye color changing to black in the final dream represents religion, good morals, and a decent life. If she sees a divorced woman, her eyes will turn from Black to blue indicates bad behavior and distance from religion. See also: Interpretation of seeing eyeliner in a dream What is the interpretation of a dream about

title: Interpretation of seeing a belt in a dream

preview.html: The interpretation of seeing a belt in a dream is considered one of the visions that have many and varied signs and indications that vary in the details of the vision depending on the dreamer’s condition. The belt is what we wear around the waist with trousers, and it is worn equally by women and men. It can be equipped with leather or fabric, today we will look at all the details related to it. Interpretation of seeing a belt in a dream Ibn Sirin can say about this vision in a dream that it differs in its interpretation, according to the difference in the dream and whether it is tight or loose. His fur in a dream can symbolize Stability, seriousness, calm, peace and protection. As he said in this vision in the man’s dream. It indicates good behavior, and the standard of the bearer of the vision. It is a good vision, God willing, and it can show determination. And if someone sees that he is tightening his belt, this indicates strictness and seriousness, as well as determination. Coordination Necessary issues so that they do not collapse, and it can also symbolize the repair of issues. As for when loose pants make him sleep. This indicates the negligence and lethargy of the owner of the vision. It may indicate a warning to him to take care of himself. And if he sees that his belt is lost or someone has stolen it. This may indicate To failure, and only God knows. Interpretation of seeing a belt in a dream. Interpretation of seeing a belt in a dream in a married woman’s dream. This dream for a married woman indicates stability, comfort, and peace, God willing. Seeing buying or wearing it could symbolize childbirth, i.e. an imminent pregnancy, God willing. If a woman sees You receive it as a gift, as this is a sign of good status. Interpretation of seeing a belt in a dream for a single woman: Seeing this girl who has never been married before in a dream is good news. But if she sees in her dream that she is wearing a belt or buying it. It can indicate joy and happiness, as well as news Sarah, if this area is beautiful and imminent. And seeing the girl was made of gold. This symbolizes marriage, engagement, or the book was written, it is good, God willing. But if you saw that it was made of precious, expensive leather, this indicates happiness and goodness. Interpretation of the vision The belt in a dream and its meaning for a pregnant woman. As for seeing it in a pregnant woman’s dream, she drinks it in her sleep, then this symbolizes peace and security, God willing alone. And a married woman who sees that it is gold is a sign of the birth of a son, and God alone knows. And if he sees that it is made of silver or cloth, then this It symbolizes that the newborn is a female, and only God knows. Its general vision for a pregnant woman is good, God willing. Different interpretations of seeing a belt in a dream. If a person sees the color black as a distinctive characteristic, then this is a sign of success and superiority. If he buys it, this indicates achieving the goals that the owner wants. Vision. As for its blue color, it indicates kindness, livelihood, and money. If the color is green, this indicates science and knowledge. If it is seen that it is white, this symbolizes peace and purity. As for seeing skin, it symbolizes a strong relationship between friends and family. And seeing a cloth. This can It indicates money or good behavior, God willing. As for seeing a man or woman made of gold in a dream, this indicates the characteristics of...

title: Interpretation of the dream of seeing electricity in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Imam Al-Sadiq

preview.html: Seeing electricity in a dream indicates superiority and the ability to achieve long-term ambitions and dreams, and electrical wires in a dream. It is just a static life for men and women, the touch of wire surrounds them with danger in every direction, in a dream, electric lights show marriage to a beautiful woman, religion and repair of electricity in a dream. Problems and disputes will end with God’s will, and the person who had the vision may have a high position in his work. In a dream, electricity indicates marriage to a suitable person. In a dream, a married woman touched electrical wires. Marital problems can lead to divorce. In this article, you have the most important and important interpretations related to seeing electricity in a dream for a man and a woman in detail. Seeing electricity in a dream by Ibn SirinImam Ibn Sirin explained that seeing electricity in a dream risks and fear of harm and pain that the dreamer will reap from the effect of this vision. Getting rid of electricity in the home Satisfaction and money from a known source. Ibn Sirin believes that the spark of electricity in a dream is his temptation and that his speech is not visible to others, and God can warn him against entering people’s symptoms and the dreamer’s inability to get rid of electricity in a dream indicates difficulties. And financial problems and crises. In a man’s dream, an exposed power cord indicates the presence of disreputable women near him and he must be careful and protect his home. Harming a sick person’s home is an outdated method, and wounds caused by electricity are bad luck and corruption. Interpretation of seeing electricity for single peopleIf it is seen by unmarried women That electricity circulates in the house and she is exposed to dangers, this is an indication that she will face many problems and dangers. If a girl sees that she is absorbing this electricity, this is evidence of quick and not very good decisions. Interpretation of seeing electricity for a married woman. Electricity in a married woman’s dream is an indication that she will be exposed to many Of marital problems. If a married woman sees that her husband is electrocuting her, this may mean her divorce. If she sees the vision of light after the spread of darkness, she will be liberated from all the pain that falls within her. Electricity in a pregnant woman’s dream: Seeing a pregnant woman with electricity in a dream is evidence of imminent birth and ease of birth. Touching electricity in a dream is nothing more than a strong desire to get rid of the pain and major problems that you are already facing. An electric shock in a pregnant woman’s dream means that there are difficult problems and disagreements with the husband, and the woman may go through an unstable psychological or physical condition. If a pregnant woman sees electricity in In a dream, this indicates the difficulties of life and thinking about the future to a large extent, and bare wires in a dream are psychological fear and anxiety resulting from symptoms of pregnancy and childbirth. And God knows the unseen and knows. An electric shock in the dream of a married man and a single person. An electric shock in a married man’s dream indicates great trouble and disagreement that hinders communication between him and his wife, and he is struck by electricity that does not support his sight and warns him of fear and loss of money. In a man’s dream, electricity indicates a bad and not good reputation. Which he knows

title: Interpretation of a crazy man in a dream: Seeing a hospital for a mentally ill person in a dream

preview.html: When you see the same crazy person, a crazy person, or a crazy woman, the behavior of a single girl, a pregnant woman, a married woman, or a divorced woman. Interpretation of the same crazy man’s interpretation by Ibn Sirini. Al-Nabulsi says when he sees the same person crazy or carrying out actions and behaviors like a crazy person, then the money and clothes are part of the inheritance that he will get, or it is money that he gets to the extent of the madness that he He saw it in a dream, but he will spend it excessively with a bad companion, and Ibn Shirin says that he achieved a high position in work for whomever was welcome, the Sultan, or the position of ruler. Interpretation of madness in a dream for Nabulsi: In the eyes of Nabulsi, madness in a dream indicates the dreamer or people who know that money Wealth and honor are what it corresponds to in this world, because it indicates the attainment of pleasures and the establishment of joys. Or seeing a righteous dead person that he is crazy, that is, his entry into Paradise, for the vision in him is beyond all reason and thought. And if a person sees himself crazy, then he gets money to spend it all, and the source of the money is livelihood or inheritance, and for children, if he sees himself crazy, then he is rich for his father. A woman's madness is fruitful for her, whether through childbirth, the good that surrounds her and her family, or marriage to the virgin. She shows love and love, if it is an act close to love, and painful beatings appear. Which the king gets if he hits things with his madness, it may sometimes indicate good and good deeds and good deeds. Interpretation of madness in a dream by Ibn Shaheen Ibn Shaheen tells us that whoever sees himself crazy, then he is one of the following states closer to his life, whether he eats money from usury, or becomes rich with inheritance money. Or livelihood, or assuming position and power. In his country or in his family, depending on the place he sees and whoever sees himself in it in the dream, and whoever sees that he has become extremely mad and almost killed him, then he is an enchanted man or an ordinary working man. In his worldly life, or he deviated from the straight path, or someone stole his money, and if that is not the case, then a calamity will befall him that will disturb his thinking and life. Interpretation of a crazy child in a dream: If a boy or girl sees that they are crazy in their dream, this indicates the wealth of their family, and if a woman sees that she She is crazy, and if she is unmarried, someone will propose to her, and if she is married, then the pregnancy will be good at once, and the madness in her dream is happy, and if she is confused about the matter, then either she is pregnant with a female or her birth is difficult. Interpretation of a crazy man in a dream, and whoever sees a crazy person knows him or does not know him He grabs him by the hand and drags him to a place while he is afraid of it, so he is safe for the fortuneteller from the plan or misfortune of the enemy who is attracting or dragging him. Others with the help of those who draw him, and whoever sees that he is sitting with a crazy man or one of his members in the house is crazy, so it is bad for that crazy person to befall, so whoever sees other crazy people does not indicate good. Others.Interpretation of an insane person in a hospital in a dream. Seeing an insane asylum or an insane person doing strange things or crazy actions unconsciously indicates joy and happiness in life. They are always interpreted through limited themes, namely: an animal that harms its owner, a person who is corrupt in religion and morals, people without morals, enemies or...
preview.text: When you see the same person crazy or crazy or crazy woman behavior of a single girl and a pregnant woman and a married and divorced woman Interpretation of the same crazy man by Ibn Sirin Al-Nabulsi says when he sees the same person crazy or doing acts and actions like a madman, then the money and clothes from the inheritance that he will get or that it is money that he gets as much as the madness that he saw in his dream but he will spend it excessively with a bad companion, and Ibn Sirin says that he achieved a high rank in work for whoever was welcome or the sultan or the position of the ruler. Interpretation of madness in a dream by Al-Nabulsi In the view of Al-Nabulsi, madness in a dream indicates the seer or people who know that money, wealth and honor are what he meets in this world, because it indicates the attainment of pleasures and the establishment of joys. Or seeing the righteous dead that he is crazy, that is, his entry into heaven, then the vision in him is above all mind and thought. And if a person sees himself crazy, he gets money that he spends all of it, and the source of money is livelihood or inheritance, and for the young if he sees himself crazy, he is rich for his father. And the madness of a woman is fruitful for her, whether by birth or for the good that prevails over her and her family or marriage to a virgin, it shows love and affection, if it is by an act close to love, and shows the painful beating that the monarch receives if he hits things with his madness, it may sometimes indicate good and righteous deeds and righteous work. Interpretation of madness in a dream by Ibn Shaheen Ibn Shaheen tells us that whoever sees himself mad, he is one of the following cases closer to his life, whether he ate money from usury, or became rich with inheritance money or livelihood, or assumed the position and authority. In his country or in his family according to the place he sees and who saw himself in it in the dream, and whoever sees that he was afflicted with severe madness and almost killed him, he is a bewitched man or a normal man of action. In his worldly life, or deviated from the straight path, or someone stole his money, and if not, a calamity befalls him that disturbs his thinking and life. Interpretation of a crazy child in a dream If a boy or a girl sees that they are crazy in their dream, this indicates the wealth of their family, and if a woman sees that she is crazy, and if she is unmarried, someone proposes to her, and if she is married, the pregnancy is good at once, and madness in her dream is happy, and if she is confused, she is either pregnant with a female or her birth is difficult. Interpretation of a crazy man in a dream And whoever sees a madman he knows or does not know, pulling him by the hand and dragging him to a place and he is afraid of him, he is safe for the fortuneteller from the plot or calamity of the enemy who attracts him or drags him. Others with the help of those who draw him, and whoever sees that he is sitting with a madman or one of his members in the house is crazy, it is bad for that madman to be afflicted, and whoever sees other madmen does not indicate good. Others. Interpretation of a madman in a hospital in a dream. As for seeing a madman in a madhouse or a madman acting strangely or doing crazy things unconsciously, this indicates joy and pleasure in life. It is always interpreted through limited themes, which are: an animal that harms its owner, or a person who is corrupt in religion and morals, or people without morals, or enemies or

title: Hair loss in a dream for a pregnant woman

preview.html: From our site, the instant translator, we will talk in detail about the vision and its interpretation by the great dream interpreters. Follow us. Interpretation of seeing hair loss in a dream for a single girl If an unmarried girl sees in her dream that her hair is falling out, she is at the peak of happiness and joy. This indicates psychological stability and peace of mind. preview.html: Interpretation of dreams about collecting broken glasses in a dream to reach the truth of the dream and interpret it well, which is the jurisprudence of scholars. Interpretation of a dream about collecting broken glass in a dream Collecting a broken bottle in a dream can indicate a serious disagreement with the person who had the vision at that time, and God knows best. In the event that A person saw that he was collecting broken glasses, this may indicate the differences and problems that the dreamer faces in his life during those days. Whoever saw in his dream that he was collecting broken glasses, it may indicate the feelings of worries and sorrows of those days, and God knows best. In the event that a person saw that he was collecting Broken glasses in a dream, this may indicate the effort and exhaustion that the dreamer makes in vain, and God knows best. In the event that If one saw that he was collecting nail polish, this may indicate that the dreamer’s financial conditions improved during that period, thanks to God. Seeing collecting nails in a dream may indicate good changes occurring in the dreamer’s life during this period. It is possible to see a collection of nail polish in a dream. It indicates the end of the sorrows and problems that the dreamer faces during this period, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about collecting pigeons in a dream Collecting pigeons in a dream may indicate the arrival of goodness to the dreamer in the coming period, thanks to God. Anyone who dreams of collecting pigeons may indicate the good luck that he will have. The dreamer during those days. It is possible that seeing collecting dung in a dream indicates a large amount of sustenance and lawful money that the dreamer may acquire in the coming period. It is possible that seeing collecting pigeons in a dream indicates that the dreamer will stop the bad deeds that he committed in the previous period. By the grace of God. Interpretation of a dream about collecting oil from the ground in a dream. Collecting oil from the ground in a dream may indicate that the dreamer is wasting his money without interest and he must stop doing that. It is possible that the vision of collecting oil from the ground with a piece of cloth indicates the many fears and problems that the dreamer may face. At that time. Seeing oil spilled on the ground may indicate a major financial loss that the dreamer may suffer in his life in those days, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about collecting firewood and lighting a fire in a dream. Collecting firewood and lighting a fire in a dream may indicate abundant goodness that the dreamer will gain in his life. At that time. Whoever saw in his dream that he was collecting firewood and lighting it, it may indicate the abundant sustenance that the dreamer will receive in those days. A dream about collecting firewood and lighting a fire in a dream may indicate good changes occurring in his life during this time, thanks to God. Whoever dreams That he was collecting firewood to light it, may indicate the power or abundant money that the dreamer will gain during this time, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about the sun and moon gathering in a dream: The presence of the sun and the moon together may indicate that the dreamer will be in good health and have a lot of sustenance during this time. title: Interpretation of visitors in a dream - the meaning of visitors in a dream

preview.html: Seeing a visitor to a single girl, married, pregnant, divorced, a single young man and a married man, either the sudden visit or relatives together, the visit of a stranger in the house, unknown, a stranger. Many people dream of our house in the guest room and more by Ibn Sirin. Meaning of visitor in a dream. Seeing a visitor in The dream is evidence of urgent livelihood and good news for the boy if the dreamer’s wife is pregnant. Whoever dreams of hosting people and offering them food, this indicates that the dreamer is responsible for the people. As for hospitality, it indicates the world coming together for good and the arrival of absence. The visitor dreams of news of a male child. He sees: guests and is not pregnant, then he will immediately obtain his livelihood. Seeing visitors in a dream has many interpretations and connotations that differ according to each person’s situation, and it is said that seeing visitors in a dream is an urgent means of livelihood or it may indicate a thief breaking into the house and the sign is a son. Sirin interpreted it as a sign of the absence of people, or it may indicate good news or livelihood with a male child, or it may indicate recovery if the dreamer is sick. Interpretation of seeing visitors in a dream by Ibn Sirin: If a person sees in his dream that he is inviting guests to his house and honoring their reception and offering Giving them food and drink until they are satisfied and filling their stomachs, this is a sign that he will be responsible for these guests and that he will care. To obey them and they will receive it. If one sees in his dream that he received an invitation from another person and accepted it well and was given many good things, then this is a sign that he will become a mujahid for the sake of God and will be martyred and enter. Paradise is for the honor of God Almighty for him. Ibn Sirin interpreted seeing an Arab guest in a dream as a sign of thieves or it could indicate worries, problems and difficult matters, but it could indicate sustenance, kindness and good luck if the appearance of the guests was good. If an unmarried woman sees in Her dream is that she is receiving guests or a group of guests at her father’s house, then this dream is good news, prosperity, marriage and success. In the home of an unmarried woman, this is news of success in work or study, and if guests come in a hurry, it is news of an abundance of food or money. If a married woman sees that she is receiving guests in her home, this means peace and enjoyment of psychological comfort, and the large number of guests in a married woman’s dream indicates... Joy and pleasure, for an unmarried person is a sign of pregnancy in a male child. Or it may indicate livelihood or money and guests in general. In a married woman’s dream, many good things come to her. A guest in a pregnant woman’s dream could be a sign of a male baby and that she will be happy and cheerful with him, and if she sees that she is feeding her guests and receiving them well, it is a sign of easy childbirth and without anything. Problems. The scholar Ibn Sirin mentioned that relatives of guests in a dream indicate the approach of kindness, happiness, and attention from the home, and feeding guests means earning a living, and offering them sweets is a sign of success, marriage, or getting married. Seeing familiar guests in a dream indicates the dreamer’s generosity, generosity, and kindness. And if a

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing the birth of a girl in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of the birth of a girl in a dream for an unmarried woman: An unmarried girl sees in her dream that she has given birth to a young and beautiful girl. This is evidence of goodness and blessing in her life, the disappearance of anxiety and overcoming the problems she suffers from, or the news of marriage and moving on. A beautiful new life portends a life full of problems and conflicts that affect it. Interpretation of giving birth to a girl in a married dream: Seeing a married woman giving birth to a girl in a dream means a happy and stable life that she lives with her husband or giving birth to children, and seeing a barren woman giving birth to a child in a dream indicates a happy life and an end to anxiety. Interpretation of the birth of a girl for a pregnant woman: If a pregnant woman sees in her dream that she is giving birth to a girl, this means that she is pregnant with a male child, or it may indicate ease of childbirth, happiness, and stability in her life. Other interpretations of seeing the birth of a girl. Scientists interpreted the birth of a girl in a dream as relief from the fatigue that the dreamer is suffering from. And recovery from illness if he is sick, and peace and stability after difficulties. The birth of a girl in a dream symbolizes good news of the fulfillment of a cherished desire of the dreamer or the response to his request from God Almighty and the fulfillment of his aspirations. The birth of a girl and her stroller. The dreamer's arms indicate the freedom of a prisoner, overcoming problems that cause stress and tension, or getting out of a financial problem and paying off debts. The birth of a girl in a dream also indicates the transition to a new life of marriage, a new job, travel, or moving to live in a new place. Giving birth to a girl in a dream from the mouth symbolizes the death of its owner. This dream.Interpretation of the birth of a girl in a man’s dream. If a man sees that he has given birth to a girl in a dream, this is evidence that he is facing worries and problems and his inability to pay his debts, and the death of this girl indicates the end of the debt and its repayment. In front of him. Also, if a man sees his wife giving birth to a daughter in a dream, this indicates the death of distress and problems and good news of a happy life and abundance of sustenance. Interpretation of a dream about the birth of two girls in a dream heralds the vision of the birth of two daughters. In a dream, there is an abundance of sustenance and blessings that fill the house. Seeing the birth of two girls in a dream indicates The overwhelming joy and happiness that the dreamer lives in. Seeing the birth of two girls in a dream symbolizes getting out of crises after suffering for a long time. If the dreamer sees this as his wife has given birth to two daughters, it is a sign of paying off debts or obtaining a higher position at work. Interpretation of a dream about the birth of a deformed girl. Seeing the birth of a deformed child indicates bad events that he will go through. The dreamer symbolizes the birth of a deformed child. In the dream, the dreamer’s character is stubborn and does not allow anyone to express his opinion. An unmarried girl who sees in her dream that she has given birth to a deformed child shows that she is thinking a lot about marriage and soon a suitable person will come to her. Seeing the birth of a deformed child in an unmarried girl’s dream is a warning not to Make the decision to marry without thinking, so as not to become the prey of a deceitful person. A man who sees in a dream the birth of a deformed child shows his insistence on ending disputes with his wife and beginning a new phase. In the dream, the dreamer’s character is stubborn and does not allow anyone to express his opinion. An unmarried girl who sees in her dream that she has given birth to a deformed child shows that she is thinking a lot about marriage and soon a suitable person will come to her. Seeing the birth of a deformed child in an unmarried girl’s dream is a warning not to Make the decision to marry without thinking, so as not to become the prey of a deceitful person. A man who sees in a dream the birth of a deformed child shows his insistence on ending disputes with his wife and beginning a new phase.
